item.title: Supporting adaptive themed icons on Android 13
item.description: Android 13 Tiramisu adds support for adaptive dynamic themed icons. You can now migrate your applications to add support for the dynamic behavior where your apps can change colors according to the system-wide theme.

item.title: Chasing Monet inside the Android framework
item.description: Material You graphic from Material.io Android 13 Tiramisu is a couple of months away from a full stable release and only last year did Google introduce Material You with Android 12/12L, changing their material design guidelines for the third time.

item.title: Dynamic themes with Compose and Material 3
item.description: Dynamic colors with compose-m3 In this article we will quickly learn how to use Jetpack Compose and Material design 3 library to build a theme for your app which uses colors generated by Material You on Android versions 12/12L and above.
